PerfectNetExp.abs: corallo 科拉洛, corallorhiza 珊瑚兰属, coralloides 珊瑚菌的旧称

means.word_mean: 1. genus of leafless root-parasitic orchids having small purplish or yellowish racemose flowers with lobed lips; widely distributed in temperate regions
